resources.string: Komodeo
android.support.design.widget.AppBarLayout$ScrollingViewBehavior
General
What is Komodeo App?

Komodeo is a study networking app that connects students with other students in class, as well as with tutors. Our goal is to make studying for classes more productive for students, thereby boosting the GPA.
What all can I do in Komodeo?

It is exclusively for classmates in your University so you will connect with people in your classes, find a tutor or become a tutor and get cash money $$$, easily coordinate a study group, match right now with a study partner near you, or post your queries in the exclusive discussion forum for your classmates.
I don‚Äôt see my university yet!

We‚Äôre a new platform that just launched at UIUC this semester, however we‚Äôre adding many more this spring or summer. In case you do not find your university in the list, reach out and Contact us, to request for your university to be added.
How can I add and invite my friends to events?
You can share events and invite others to download the app via the ‚ÄúShare‚Äù button on the event itself, or invite your contacts through your Friends list under ‚Äúsuggested friends‚Äù
Is Komodeo available in my country?
Currently we are focusing in the American universities, we‚Äôll add more universities in the US and other countries soon!
I would like to be an ambassador for my University, how can I go about finding out more?
-We‚Äôd love to have you join our team, please Contact us to take this further. Teammates enjoy tons of free swag, local discounts, and school supplies!
I like the concept of the app and believe in the cause!
-We appreciate your support, feel free to share our app with more people, because the bigger the community, the better it is for all users.
Classes
Why can I do in the class tab?

-The class tab enables you to post any questions you have, find answers for similar questions and also answer questions from other students. Class tab also provides users with access to lots of other classmates. We believe that no student should miss out points on assignments because they couldn‚Äôt figure out solutions to it.
What if I added a course late, or dropped my course, or changed my major, or‚Ä¶!
-No fretting! You can join up to 8 class discussions at any given time.
How can I add classes?
-Add them on the Add Class Homepage!
I don‚Äôt see my class in the default class list

-Firstly, you will need to add the university you are attending, in order to have the class data. This is done in the beginning, when the app account is created or can be added in ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù. We are constantly updating the class database, so it might be possible that we might have been unaware of some of the classes. In case you don‚Äôt find your class in the list, you can ‚Äú+ Add class‚Äù.
There are duplicates of classes, which one do I join?
-Users might have created multiple groups for the same class, make sure you join the class with most amount of members in it.
Tutoring
Why do I need to use Komodeo for Tutoring sessions?

-Admit it, there are classes that are just so hard that you and your buddies have a hard time figuring it out. Professors and TAs are just going to answer, but none of them are going to teach the whole content? So what do we do when we are completely lost and tutors are freaking expensive? :We use Komodeo. Komodeo let us upperclassmen, TAs, and other classmates who understand the content, to be able to conduct tutoring events. The prices of these tutoring events will be affordable because other classmates (that you‚Äôve never met) could also pool in the costs and let the session happen! Now you could have a tutoring session going over the weekly quiz for $4 right at your place for 1 hr every Sunday, with your neighbours!! What do you tell the professor tryin‚Äô to screw your GPA? Not today. üëãüé§
How much will a tutoring session cost?

-Prices of the tutoring session are decided by tutors based on $/head or $/session. $/head price is fixed and tutors might cancel the session due to lack of interest in the session. So, if a tutor charges $4/head and requires $20/session, then the tutor might likely cancel the event in case there are less than 5 students interested. $/session price is variable per user based on the number of students attending, although the income is fixed for the tutor. If the event is $15/session, then attendance of 5 students would cost $3 per student and an attendance of 2 students would cost $7.5 per student.
>How can I pay for the tutor?
-Check out the top left payment icon on your tutor‚Äôs profile. This is the method that they prefer. In-app payments coming soon!
How can I show that I am qualified to tutor?

-Your profile will have a ‚ÄúStar‚Äù icon on the top right, where documents proving the credentials can be uploaded. Credentials can include official transcripts, pictures of Exams/HW/Quiz scores. But ultimately, credibility is built by positive ratings from satisfied students!
Who are the tutors?

-The tutors can be TAs, professors, upperclassmen, local residents or even other classmates who understand the class well. Be sure to select the tutor based on the uploaded credentials and positive ratings from other users! How do I become a tutor? Go to the ‚ÄúTutor‚Äù tab in Settings and simply add your classes you can tutor for! Helpful Hint: To greatly increase requests for you, add your credentials on your Profile.
Can I have a private tutoring session?

-Absolutely! You can customize the amount of students that you would want, for the tutoring session that you create. An event can either have 1 student (private tutoring), or a lot of students (thereby cutting the payment per student costs).
What should I bring to a Tutor event?

It‚Äôs up to you how you want to make use of your time with the tutor, so come prepared with homework problems (and your etext/notes, if applicable). It‚Äôs also helpful to message your tutor in advance so they can bring helpful material to you
How I available do events for for make me myself register students to tutoring with?
- We gotta wait and see what Khadeer did to this.
Study
Why do I need to use Komodeo Study events?

-A lot of research has shown that group studying increases productivity. Group study, created through Komodeo, helps students find other classmates living nearby to study with. This helps students save time on commuting and creates a schedule for themselves, that enables them to consistently study for the class throughout the semester. An efficient study schedule enables students to have a less stressful time before their exams or other assignment deadlines, while boosting their GPA simultaneously.
How do the study events work?

-You can create a custom study event with different timings, dates, location as well as group size. The events can also be recurred throughout the semester, so that students consistently study for the class throughout the semester. You can invite friends as well as enable other classmates living nearby to find and join the event. It is possible that your neighbour might be in your class!
Where do I create a study event?

-You can create a study group event by going to the class discussion page and clicking the plus sign under ‚ÄúStudy Events‚Äù, OR while viewing your profile you can schedule an event in your Availability Calendar.
Events (General)
Where do the events take place?
Tutoring events have the location default to the one chosen by whoever creates the event (student/tutor). However, location for the study event is always decided by one who creates it.
What‚Äôs the difference between a Study event and a Tutor event?

-Study events are always free and consist of your classmates, while Tutor events cost a few dollars and are led by an experienced tutor. Anyone can create a study event, while you can either request a tutor or join an existing session. You can also become a tutor by adding classes that you are qualified to tutor in Settings and uploading credentials at the top of your Profile.
Miscellaneous
There is a glitch in the app.
-We apologize for the inconvenience. Komodeo is a new app and we are refining it to best fit the needs of its users. Please do Contact us, to report any bugs encountered.
How do I trust strangers who I meet through app?

-University/College campuses are relatively safe environment with lower crime rate. However, it‚Äôs better to be safe than sorry. Try to visit events set up in public places (cafes, lounges, libraries etc), rather than at someones home. If it‚Äôs at someone‚Äôs home, try visiting with other people you already know, or an event with a lot of people going. Komodeo is just a platform and is not liable for any misbehavior from users.
I am interested in creating a partnership

Yes, please do Contact Us! Whether you‚Äôre a local business, an interested sponsor for our events, influencer, or even in a similar space, send us over a chat or email admin@komodeo.com, and we will get in touch.
